queries.description: The data passed to the asctime() function is invalid. This can lead to buffer overflow.
queries.name: Do not pass invalid data to the asctime() function

MSC33-C.title: Do not pass invalid data to the asctime() function

queries.description: Do not call va_arg() on a va_list that has an indeterminate value.
queries.name: Do not call va_arg() on a va_list that has an indeterminate value

MSC39-C.title: Do not call va_arg() on a va_list that has an indeterminate value

queries.description: The right hand operand of a shift operator shall lie in the range zero to one less than the width in bits of the essential type of the left hand operand.
queries.name: The right operand of a shift shall be smaller then the width in bits of the left operand

RULE-12-2.title: The right hand operand of a shift operator shall lie in the range zero to one less than the width in bits of the essential type of the left hand operand

queries.description: An object shall not be copied or assigned to an overlapping object.
queries.name: An object shall not be assigned to an overlapping object

queries.description: An object shall not be copied to an overlapping object.
queries.name: An object shall not be copied to an overlapping object

RULE-19-1.title: An object shall not be assigned or copied to an overlapping object
